column4: I really wish I could get 10.04 working.  I'm trying to install it and it just keeps hanging at the splash screen.
I already wiped, but it would be a shame to have to go back to 9.10
when at the splash screen, can you enter any of the consoles? ctrl+alt+1
I can indeed.  If I hit escape I can even get to the terminals.  It isn't locking up, just hanging.
